title: Consumers who have purchased a meal from a food truck in the U.S. 2014 , by age
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Share of respondents. In total the number of data points it has is 6.
In general Share of respondents has fallen over the Year.

Share of respondents is roughly constant from 18_to_34_years to 55_to_64_years, slightly decreasing from 55_to_64_years to 65_years_and_over, and lastly slightly increasing from 65_years_and_over to All_adults.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 55_to_64_years and 65_years_and_over.
The highest Share of respondents, of value 56.0 was reached at Year 18_to_34_years
Minimum Share of respondents about 30.0 was reached at Year 65_years_and_over
